title: Folders

title: thunderbird
content: When I open an email messages in message pane the window is really small. I resize the window, using ctrl+ scroll, but next time when I open thunderbird goes back to being the same small size again. How do I get Thunderbird to persist the messages size that I would prefer?
creator: aaathari
